_source.short_desc: USATP provides K12 educators with standards-aligned learning resources to help every student master state learning standards.
_source.long_desc: From learning loss recovery to advanced mastery, the Progress Learning platform from USATestprep engages and challenges students of all levels. Easy-to-use data helps teachers gauge where students are struggling and where they're succeeding. More than 6,000 schools and 100,000 educators look to the Progress platform to assess, engage, and move students to the next level--all in one place. Free trials and demos for schools and districts.
_source.pricing_details: 25% to 75% discounts for package pricing. LIFTOFF adaptive learning included with all elementary and middle school packages. Additional discounts for multi-year and districts, as well as seasonal promotions.  Unlimited users per rooftop with no hidden fees.
_source.target_audience: USATestprep is ideal for teachers and school administrators seeking to close performance gaps and improve student mastery on state standards.

media.caption: Welcome Screen - overview of upcoming assignments and progress
Engaging games that promote standards mastery
Easily view upcoming or available assignments
Practice on your own when you're away from class
Understand areas that need more practice

category_features.name: Assessment Management
category_features.definition: Create tests or questionnaires

category_features.name: Automated Proctoring
category_features.definition: Automate exam monitoring with features like facial recognition and screen sharing tracking to prevent impersonification and cheating

category_features.name: Automatic Grading
category_features.definition: Automatically score assessment results

category_features.name: Candidate Management
category_features.definition: Build, track, and maintain relationships with candidates.

category_features.name: Certification & Licensing
category_features.definition: Track and ensure employees obtain necessary skill sets/certifications

category_features.name: Online Tests
category_features.definition: Exams administered online via computers or other electronic devices

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Quizzes
category_features.definition: Brief assessments used to measure knowledge and skills

category_features.name: Randomization
category_features.definition: Randomize the displayed order of questions and answer options

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Test Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule students for online testing

category_features.name: Time Limits
category_features.definition: Set time limits with respect to the entire exam or as per the questions

category_features.name: Weighted Questions
category_features.definition: Assign weighting to individual test questions according to the level of importance

category_features.name: Financial Management
category_features.definition: Provide a comprehensive overview of organization's finances

category_features.name: Academic/Education
category_features.definition: Software specialized for schools (K-12 & Post-Secondary)

category_features.name: Asynchronous Learning
category_features.definition: Learning sessions in which a group of learners are participating and engaging in learning at different times

category_features.name: Blended Learning
category_features.definition: Courses or paths that combine in person classes with virtual online classes

category_features.name: Built-in Course Authoring
category_features.definition: Tools that allow you to create and publish courses and course material/content

category_features.name: Built-in LMS
category_features.definition: LMS functionality built-in for content delivery

category_features.name: Certification & Licensing
category_features.definition: Track and ensure employees obtain necessary skill sets/certifications

category_features.name: Corporate/Business
category_features.definition: Software specialized for corporate training

category_features.name: Course Management
category_features.definition: Create a course, organize it and assign it to learners

category_features.name: Learner Portal
category_features.definition: Students can access materials and communicate with instructors via their online student profile

category_features.name: Mobile Learning
category_features.definition: Access for students to complete learning materials on mobile platforms

category_features.name: Modeling & Simulation
category_features.definition: Hands-on, interactive training method

category_features.name: Synchronous Learning
category_features.definition: Learning sessions in which a group of learners are participating and engaging in learning at the same time

category_features.name: Training Administration
category_features.definition: Back-office tasks (ie. schedule courses, organize resources, course registrations, and email reminders)

category_features.name: Training Companies
category_features.definition: Software designed for companies who offer training programs to clients

category_features.name: eCommerce Management
category_features.definition: Sell products online

related_products.short_desc:
TestGorilla works. CVs don't. 

TestGorilla is online exam software that helps you make better hiring decisions.
related_products.features:
Hire the best. No bias. No stress. TestGorilla offers recruiters like you the best online exam software to test candidates so you that can make better hiring decisions.

Using multiple test types in an exam gives the best predictive value, so we have a growing test library including: cognitive ability tests, programming tests, software skill tests, personality tests, culture fit tests, language tests, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Easy LMS has all the tools you need to take your employee and customer training to the next level, but it's much easier to use.
related_products.features: Built in the Netherlands by a multicultural team, Easy LMS is the coolest and most user-friendly LMS on the market. Easy LMS has the simple and to-the-point Dutch design that makes it much easier to use than any other platforms out there. Also, it's fairly-priced and available in many languages. Request a demo today and see for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Versatile online exam solution with 9 different question types, detailed analytics, non-cheating features, and a question library.
related_products.features: A flexible online exam solution that allows large and small schools and businesses to create exams using nine different question types, a large public library, time limits, advanced scheduling, analytics, instant, data-based feedback, real-time grading, and anti-cheating features. Create your assessment your way.

related_products.short_desc: Conduct high stake exams online with remote proctoring, ideal to conduct a high volume of assessments, tests or exams.
related_products.features:
Talview's Online Exam Solution is ideal for enterprise organizations planning to conduct a high volume of assessments, tests or exams. It is a configurable tool that supports various exam formats such as MCQs, essays, coding & aptitude tests. 

Talview comes with online proctoring to deter test-takers from cheating. Its remotely proctored exams integrate seamlessly with leading LMSs. What's more, it is mobile-friendly and candidates can attend assessments from anywhere, in a seamless manner.

related_products.short_desc: Create formative and summative assessments, including quizzes, tests and secure exams students complete on their own devices.
related_products.features:
Create a variety of formative and summative assessments, including quizzes, open book tests and secure exams students can complete on any device.

Save time with auto-grading functionality and maintain academic integrity no matter where assessments take place. With Top Hat, professors can monitor student activity and get an automatically generated proctor report as soon as the assessment ends.

related_products.short_desc: Robust exam software with a separate manager interface, easy upload of videos & PDFs, real-time reports, and certificates of completion
related_products.features: 20 years experience in managing both high stakes and practice exams for global organizations. Extremely feature rich and cost effective; 4 exam templates; 6 question types, randomization, analytical reporting engine, easy upload of videos and PDFs for training, integration with 3rd party systems via APIs and webhooks, manager/supervisor interface with role-based access-control, real-time certificates of completion. And USA based phone support!

related_products.short_desc: #1 Exam Software for Training, Recruitment and Certification. Easy to use and full of advanced features. For organizations of any size.
related_products.features: Test Invite is a cloud based Exam Software solution that delivers robust item banking and analytics, control over your entire testing process and ability to test securely via Lock Down Browser and Webcam Video Recording. You can create, deliver, and grade exams, and then report on student, course, and program performance. We publish training videos in our YouTube channel so that you can start from day 1.

related_products.short_desc: Engage students with superior exam solutions-outcome-based, interactive quizzes, polls, followed by instant results and data insights.
related_products.features:
Creatrix' Examination Management System helps harness the exam process to evaluate student learning outcomes towards improvement. Students can take online or offline exams, get alerts, and view results online.

The system helps institutions maintain strict confidentiality and drop conflicts with dynamic scheduling; capture & track incidents of misconduct in real-time. With entire exam data centralized, it's easy to collect, aggregate, document student & program-related data in single clicks.

related_products.short_desc: A suite of tools to help build a more versatile learning environment. GoConqr gives educators the tools they need to maximise potential
related_products.features: GoConqr gives educators the tools they need to maximise their students learning potential. Whether it's by using our content creation tools to make fantastic learning resources, discovering relevant user-created learning material in the GoConqr Library, or sharing resources and ideas in Groups, GoConqr empowers students by delivering an immersive and collaborative learning experience.

related_products.short_desc: Self Service business exam and assessment software that generates sophisticated, branded, personalized individual and cohort reports
related_products.features: Easy to use tool that empowers you to build business exams and assessments with beautiful sophisticated reports built using our MS Word and our Word Addin. Certifications, Timers, Question Randomization and Pooling, Automated Scoring, Fully Multilingual. Assessor functionality for complex requirements. Used by Fortune 500 global corporations & startups alike.

similar_products.short_desc: Digiexam is the secure exam platform built to manage the entire exam workflow and drive adoption through its ease of use.
similar_products.features:
Digiexam is the secure exam platform built to manage the entire exam workflow and drive adoption through its ease of use, on-campus and remote. 

We support 900+ modern educators worldwide in digitalising their exam process to improve academic excellence, operational efficiency and student experience. 

The company was founded in Stockholm, Sweden in 2011 and consists of a growing multinational team of 20+ people. Read more at www.digiexam.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Synap is an easy to use platform that allows institutes to deliver effective, engaging exam preparation and live exams seamlessly.
similar_products.features:
Synap is an award-winning exam platform that empowers organisations to deliver secure, online exams with ease. Save time and reduce your workload for creating, marking and analysing exams.

Customise your tests with a range of multiple-choice and written question types, timers, randomising, and question bank options.

Reduce cheating and maintain exam integrity by stopping copying and pasting or by proctoring the exams.

In-depth data and visual reporting for candidate and question performances.

similar_products.short_desc: Robust exam software with a separate manager interface, easy upload of videos & PDFs, real-time reports, and certificates of completion
similar_products.features: 20 years experience in managing both high stakes and practice exams for global organizations. Extremely feature rich and cost effective; 4 exam templates; 6 question types, randomization, analytical reporting engine, easy upload of videos and PDFs for training, integration with 3rd party systems via APIs and webhooks, manager/supervisor interface with role-based access-control, real-time certificates of completion. And USA based phone support!

similar_products.short_desc: FlexiQuiz, online exam maker. Flexible & easy to use, so you can make & share custom exams, tests, courses, or quizzes.
similar_products.features:
FlexiQuiz is a cloud-based exam maker where educators can quickly create, share, and analyze custom exams.
Choose from hundreds of configurable features to build professional exams that engage students and test their knowledge on any subject. The platform includes features such as; question banks, time limits, question randomization, email notifications, 9 question types, and the ability to add images, video, or audio.

similar_products.short_desc: Online pre-employment skills testing solution for finding and hiring the right person for the position.
similar_products.features: TestGenius pre-employment testing suite features HR assessments to measure office and computer skills, training, and public-safety dispatcher skills. Online and installed licensing available for all industries including public sector, universities, retail, financial, and private sector. Includes TestWriter for creating custom tests and integrates with many applicant tracking systems. FREE DEMOS. TestGenius is a product of Biddle Consulting Group, specialists in talent assessments since 1974.

similar_products.features: Easy to use tool that empowers you to build business exams and assessments with beautiful sophisticated reports built using our MS Word and our Word Addin. Used by Fortune 500 global corporations & startups alike.

You can create, deliver, and grade exams, and then report on student, course, and program performance. We publish training videos in our YouTube channel so that you can start from day 1.

similar_products.short_desc: Secure e-assessment platform that empowers universities, awarding organisations, governments, and schools to deliver digital exams.
similar_products.features: Inspera Assessment is a cloud-based assessment platform that empowers universities, awarding organisations, governments, municipalities, and schools to deliver secure, standardised tests, open and closed book exams, as well as formative and diagnostics tests.

similar_products.short_desc: An online assessment engine with proven efficiency in conducting millions of proctored assessments for academia and corporates
similar_products.features:
An online assessment engine with proven efficiency in conducting millions of proctored assessments for academia and corporates

What can you do using Eklavvya
> Academic / Certification Assessments
> Moodle Proctoring Plugin
> Skill-Based Assessments
> Communication, Writing Skill Assessment 
> Custom Domain Assessment
> Coding Skill Assessment
> Bulk Academic Viva-Voce, Interviews with Recording

All assessments are empowered with a secure browser, AI Video/ image Proctoring, Live Monitoring

Creatrix' Examination Management System helps harness the exam process to evaluate student learning outcomes towards improvement. Students can take online or offline exams, get alerts, and view results online.

The system helps institutions maintain strict confidentiality and drop conflicts with dynamic scheduling; capture & track incidents of misconduct in real-time. With entire exam data centralized, it's easy to collect, aggregate, document student & program-related data in single clicks.

similar_products.short_desc: Integrity Advocate is browser-based software for online proctoring, identity verification, and participation monitoring.
similar_products.features:
The only identity verification, participation monitoring, and exam proctoring solution built on Privacy by Design principles, Integrity Advocate protects learner privacy and ensures assessment integrity for online learning events. Leveraging human review assisted by artificial intelligence and biometric technology, services are available 24/7 on all devices, no plugins or software installation required. 

Truly GDPR Compliant. 
All Browsers & Mobile Devices.
60 Languages
No software to install.

similar_products.short_desc: Online testing and proctoring solution for education, corporate training, and certifications.
similar_products.features: Uxpertise XP is a web-based proctoring and examination software designed for corporate training, certifications, and education. It helps educators and businesses with test creation, grading, and proctoring. Features of the platform include screen recording, violation tracking, screen lock down, test scheduling, and automatic grading.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Classroom Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Classroom Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Classroom Management software creates, manages, and assesses class lesson plans and school curriculums for primary and secondary public or private schools. Teachers use these applications to create tests and lesson plans, manage attendance, enable online collaboration, monitor student activities, and manage documents via a convenient, integrated online interface. Classroom Management solutions allow easy contact from student to teacher, teacher to principal and principal to district school administration. Classroom Management software is related to Gradebook software and School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

_source.features_tokenized_text: assessment_management automatic_grading candidate_management online_tests question_library quizzes randomization reporting/analytics
